CutSceneText.Text: Spirit's Incense Burner... and Scroll of Repose...
With the twain... awaken... a forgotten power....
were lost in battle... betwixt Stormwing and Tiamat's men.
Aeshma and Bhemah... they hide... in their underground tombs. Find them....
They... were the last bearers... of the Incense Burner and the Scroll... ere they vanished.
